attributes.action: Allow hunting with dogs BUT use MP's and the lords instead of a fox!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British hard working tax paying people of the UK wish the Prime Minister (this one serving at the moment, not the one who will take over very soon with the posh accent) to allow hunting with dogs BUT to use MP's.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
